## Session Flow
1. Pre-brief (agenda, permissions)
2. Live walkthrough (who leads what)
3. Interaction checkpoints (where coach steps back)
4. Post-session survey questions

## Risks & Mitigations
- Connectivity issues → backup dial-in.
- Privacy concerns → share consent script.
- Cognitive overload → limit simultaneous prompts.

## Follow-up Actions
- Artifacts to send back
- Metrics to dashboard
- Next iteration decision rule
